mapper.insert: insert into dockingEnvironment_tb (de_id, de_title, de_creationDate, de_writer) values (#{docId}, #{title}, #{creationDate}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select de_id docId, de_title title, de_creationDate creationDate de_writer writer from dockingEnvironment_tb where de_id=#{docId}
select de_id docId, de_title title, de_creationDate creationDate de_writer writer from dockingEnvironment_tb
